sentences.sContent: Sarah is the elder of the two.
sentences.sCn: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.sContent: a meeting of the village elders
...But an accumulating body of research indicates that some distinctions between one type of elder care and another have little real bearing on how well residents do...

synos.tran: 年长的；年龄较大的；资格老的

words.tran: 上了年纪的；过了中年的；稍老的

trans.tranOther: the elder of two people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first
a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old
